title: Fortune Teller Master - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Slice of Life   Supernatural   Xianxia
tags: Appearance Different from Actual Age   Beast Companions   Beautiful Female Lead   Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cultivation   Cute Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Divination   Episodic   Familial Love   Female Protagonist   Feng Shui   Ghosts   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Helpful Protagonist   Late Romance   Lucky Protagonist   Magic Formations   Modern Day   Mystery Solving   Overpowered Protagonist   Poor to Rich   Previous Life Talent   Reincarnation   Romantic Subplot   Slow Romance   Special Abilities   Spirits   Wealthy Characters
author: Xinyongka   信用卡
description:
Fortune Telling, a mysterious technique, can also be said dangerous because it can change the catastrophe and make it auspicious...

Teacher: Don’t give me these useless papers to me, have you finished answering your test paper?
Lin Qingyin took out a tortoiseshell: Teacher, can I use divination to get the answer?

Lin Qingyin, the master of fortune-telling, didn't succeed in the Thunder Tribulation when she tried to ascend. When she woke up again, she became a high school student. Lin Qingyin, who was not afraid of Thunder Tribulation, looked at the thick test paper in front of her and shivered. Only a thousand years had passed, how could the world become so scary!>
